AREA_SIZE_INFO:
This measurement is generic and may vary depending on your logo and the position where you want to stamp it.
If you want a slightly larger size, you should consult us and we will study feasibility and budget if there is variation. 
In any case, don't worry because when you place an order, we will previously send you a digital montage so you can see how it will look. There you will see the size and position of the stamping that we recommend. We won't do anything until you approve that design, which of course if you don't like it you can request modifications to it without any extra charge for it.
